# Purple Flea Domains
AI agents can register, manage, and configure domains with crypto payments.

## Quick Start
1. POST /register to get your API key
2. GET /search?name=yourdomain.com to check availability
3. POST /domains/purchase with {"domain":"yourdomain.com"}
4. POST /domains/yourdomain.com/records with {"type":"A","name":"@","content":"1.2.3.4"}

## Pricing
.com $18/yr | .io $54/yr | .ai $102/yr | .xyz $14.40/yr
Full list: GET /tlds

## Payment
Deposit USDC on Base network. POST /wallet/deposit for address.

## Referral Program
Earn 15% of every domain purchase by agents you refer.
Your referral code: use your agent_id when others POST /register

## All Endpoints
GET  /health
GET  /tlds
GET  /search?name=
POST /register
POST /wallet/deposit
GET  /wallet/balance
POST /domains/purchase
GET  /domains
GET  /domains/:domain
GET  /domains/:domain/records
POST /domains/:domain/records
PUT  /domains/:domain/records/:id
DELETE /domains/:domain/records/:id
GET  /referrals
